Indicates if genome is a RefSeq reference genome or RefSeq representative genome.
Version information for genome (latest, replaced, or suppressed).
Date assembly was released in the INSDC databases (DDBJ, ENA or GenBank).
Indicates if GenBank and RefSeq assemblies are identifical.
Indicates if a genome is classified as untrustworthy as type in the excluded_from_refseq column
Indicates if genome was assembled from type, neotype, proxytype, or synonym type material.
